#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main() 
{
	int A[100],ans,N,T,i;
	cin>>T;
	while(T--)
	{
		ans=0;
		cin>>N;
		for(i=0;i<N;i++)
		{
			cin>>A[i];
			while(A[i]>=i+1)
			{
				A[i]=A[i]-i-1;
				ans++;
			}
		}
		if(ans%2==0)
		cout<<"BOB"<<"\n";
		else 
		cout<<"ALICE"<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
